items.summary: Update the global theme color tokens to a sky-blue primary palette (replacing the current sunset-orange palette) while keeping the overall dark, vibrant, readable look across the app (buttons, links, focus rings, gradients, icons, and interactive states).

Update premium shadow/glow styling to match the new sky-blue palette, including the reusable premium shadow utilities and any Tailwind theme shadow tokens that currently embed sunset-orange glow values.

Update the app-wide backdrop treatment to match the sky-blue theme by replacing the current sunset-orange tinted overlay gradients used by the .app-backdrop styling, while preserving layering (z-index), opacity behavior, and reduced-motion behavior for the subtle drift animation.
Add a new generated background image asset with a sky-blue art direction and update the app to use it as the app-backdrop background image URL.
